title: Which technology can be learned in few weeks? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don't really know the purpose behind this question, but web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Ajax etc (in this very order) are quite easy to learn. At least within a week you can start making basic web-pages and view them in your browser. The fun thing about them is that you start seeing the output almost as fast as you learn. So the fun in the whole learning process evolves like a geometric progression. A good way to begin the quest may be this:W3Schools Online Web Tutorials If you are looking for something of scientific use this might not be the best thing for you. All the best for your quest.
